Text:
Yes tz oink exactly like you were told in the writeup: "NOTE: 

Read by high quality electronic voice.  
Dont like that?  
Dont download it.  
Dont complain. 
Dont get in the way."

Are YOU a machine, oink?  Probably not.  Most of them are competent these days.

Don't get in the way of what, exactly?

Mono 22khz 40kbps mp3 is not high quality by any standard.
